message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You rejected 50/50, now it's time to make a deal
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I'm not going to give up too much!
You're not giving up much, I need more to make it worth my while
I'm not getting any younger, let's make a deal before I get nothing!
You're getting desperate, I'm not going to take advantage of you
I'm running out of time, I need a better deal now!
You're getting close to nothing, I'm not going to let you leave with all the cash
I'm out of options, take it or leave it!
You're really running out of time, and so am I
I'll give you almost everything, just please make it end!
